|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4748A1;BCM4748A1KFBG, CS1152 P11, 177573 N1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Product: HP '''J9798A''' (AM) / '''J9799A''' (WW) :Regulatory Model: '''RSVLC-1103''' :HP Part Number: 5998-6879a
==See also== *[[HP M210 802.11n Wireless Access Point]] (JL023A AM, JL024A WW) :Part: JL024A, Device Type: Radio access point, Form factor: External, :Frequency Band: 2.4GHz, 5GHz, Radios (built-in): 802.11a/b/g/n, :Interfaces: 1x 1000Base-T (RJ-45), Antenna: 2x Internal, Dual-band, :Single-radio indoor device at 5GHz or 2.4GHz, PoE power: 7W (PoE) *[[HP M220 802.11n Wireless Access Point]] (J9798A AM, J9799A WW) :Part: J9799A, Device Type: Radio access point, Form Factor: External, :Frequency Band: 2.4GHz, 5GHz, Radios (built-in): 802.11a/b/g/n, :Interfaces: 1x 1000Base-T (RJ-45), Antenna: Internal, Dual-band, :Single-radio indoor device at 5GHz or 2.4GHz *[[HP M330 Dual Radio 802.11ac Access Point]] (JL062A AM, JL063A WW) :''HPE OfficeConnect M330 Dual Radio 802.11ac Access Point'' :Part: JL063A, Device Type: Radio access point, Form Factor: External, :Frequency Band: 2.4GHz, 5GHz, Radios (built-in): 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, :Interfaces: 1x 1000Base-T (RJ-45), Antenna: Internal, Dual-band, :Dual-radio indoor device at 2.4/5GHz, RAM: 256MB, Flash: 128MB
[[Category:English Documentation]]
